Package com.ericadubois.amazeballz.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompletionFragment
    This fragment displays when a user has completed a maze.
    LevelSelectFragment
    This fragment displays the level options for the user to choose from.
    LoginActivity
    This activity allows the user to sign-in to the app using google sign-in.
    MainActivity
    The Main activity is the main controller for the UI.
    MazeFragment
    This fragment holds the maze view and the ball view.
    SettingsActivity
    Necessary for shared preferences.
    SettingsFragment
    Necessary for shared preferences.
    StatsAdapter
    Stats adapter class, used for showing attempts in recyclerView.
    StatsFragment
    The fragment that displays the user stats.
